topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538d2c926368727f94330600#post_538d2c926368727f94330600


the 5 year plans were a neccesary part during ww2, stalin knew hitler was going to start his mass expansionism, and he needed to push russian into the industria era, since they didint had any heavy armory to fight against.

his method was ruthless and killed millions, but at the end it was neccesary to help push back the nazis (along with the winter), and the japanese (if russia didint had the weapons to fight them both, they could have taken over all of russia, and killed more slavics than what stalin killed (soviet experiments were pretty bad, but have you read what the japanese experiments were? they were just inhuman in every way)

then there is the whole winter war which does show stalin evil side, im just saying what he did with the whole 5 year plan was not the most evil thing he did, but everyone only focuses on that.

this is a tired subject, so its better if we move on.
